sense.def:
To regard someone or something as being a particular thing or as having a particular quality
pomeni misliti, da ima oseba ali stvar določeno lastnost.

seg.quote: I regard it as one of my masterpieces.
She now regarded herself as a woman.

sense.def:
To regard something or someone with a particular feeling
pomeni, da imamo do osebe ali stvari določena čustva ali občutke.

cit.quote: gledati na koga z določenimi občutki

seg.quote: He is regarded with some suspicion by the country's leaders.

sense.def:
To have a high regard for someone
pomeni, da človeka zelo cenimo.

seg.quote: I have a high regard for Mike.
My regard for him grew day by day.

seg.quote: Give my regards to your daughter.

sense.def:
Z izrazi
as regards
,
with regard to
ali
in regard to
lahko uvedemo témo, o kateri bomo govorili;

seg.quote: As regards the car, I put an advertisement in the paper.
With regard to the gas fire, we hardly use it.
My upbringing was fairly strict in regard to obedience and truthfulness.
